str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From a derivative of tithemi; something put down, i.e. A substruction.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To have strength, be strong, be in full health and vigor, be able; meton: I prevail. From ischus; to have force.
To complete, bring to completion, carry out, perform. From ek and teleo; to complete fully.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).
To mock, ridicule. From en and paizo; to jeer at, i.e. Deride.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
